```{r}
mensuels=read.csv2("data/Indices/indices_mensuels.csv")

data=data.table(mensuels)
data$date=paste(data$annee,data$Mois,"01",sep="-")

ts=xts(data[,!c("annee","Mois","date"),with=FALSE],order.by = as.Date(data$date),frequency = 30.4)

```


### Evolutions temporelles

```{r}

dygraph(ts) %>%
  dyRoller(rollPeriod = 1)%>%
  dyRangeSelector(height = 30)

```
